content.question: Which of the following claims is best supported by the information in the figure?

choices.label: The Asian and African elephants are the most closely related species shown on the tree.
The mammoth diverged from its most recent common ancestor with African elephants before the mastodon diverged from its most recent common ancestor with Stegodons.
The mastodon and the Stegodon diverged from their common ancestor <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> million years ago.
The common ancestor of the African elephant and the mastodon is the Palaeomastodon.

content.answer: The common ancestor of the African elephant and the mastodon is the Palaeomastodon.
